responses.rationale: Describes a specific case outcome, not a general capability or preparedness measure.
Reports a new case and contact tracing, not a capability or preparedness statement.
Reports a new case, not a capability or preparedness statement.
Describes securing vaccine doses ('has already secured 111 million doses') and their adaptability ('can be adapted').
Contains explicit reassurance ('risk... is considered to be low').
Describes monitoring ('continuously and actively monitoring the situation') and securing doses ('ensuring access to over 40 million doses').
Describes countries securing doses ('are also in the process of securing preventative vaccine doses').
Describes the purpose of doses, not a capability or preparedness measure itself.
Describes the process of procurement ('will be jointly procured').
Describes securing doses and options ('secures up to 665,000 doses', 'includes an option for a further 40 million vaccines').
Describes securing doses and initial distribution ('will sign a contract... to secure over 40 million doses', 'first shipments heading').
Describes trials starting ('Veterinary trials... have started') without explicit reassurance.
Describes a call for action/safeguard ('called for a UK-wide compulsory housing order').

Describes companies 'working on bird flu vaccines' and 'developing other therapeutics'.

Describes uncertainty about regulatory status, not a capability or preparedness statement.
